017package com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.ycwcm;
018
019import com.badlogic.gdx.Gdx;
020import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color;
021import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL20;
022import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Mesh;
023import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture;
024import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttribute;
025import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttributes;
026import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch;
027import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion;
028import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram;
029import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Affine2;
030import com.badlogic.gdx.math.MathUtils;
031import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
032import com.badlogic.gdx.utils.NumberUtils;
033import com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.FloatColors;
034
035import java.nio.Buffer;
036
037/**
038 * A substitute for {@link com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch} that adds an additional attribute to store an
039 * extra color's worth of channels, used to modify the luma and chromatic channels of a color by multiplication (called
040 * the "tweak") while the primary color affects the color additively (just called the color, often drawn from
041 * {@link Palette} or generated with {@link FloatColors}).
042 * <br>
043 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 12/14/2019.
044 */
045public class ColorfulBatch implements Batch {
046    public static final int SPRITE_SIZE = 24;
047    public static final String TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE = "a_tweak";
048
049    private Mesh mesh;
050
051    private final float[] vertices;
052    private int idx = 0;
053    private Texture lastTexture = null;
054    private float invTexWidth = 0, invTexHeight = 0;
055
056    private boolean drawing = false;
057
058    private final Matrix4 transformMatrix = new Matrix4();
059    private final Matrix4 projectionMatrix = new Matrix4();
060    private final Matrix4 combinedMatrix = new Matrix4();
061
062    private boolean blendingDisabled = false;
063    private int blendSrcFunc = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
064    private int blendDstFunc = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
065    private int blendSrcFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
066    private int blendDstFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
067
068    private final ShaderProgram shader;
069    private ShaderProgram customShader = null;
070    private boolean ownsShader;
071
072    protected float color = Palette.GRAY;
073    private final Color tempColor = new Color(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1f);
074
075    /**
076     * A constant packed float that can be assigned to this ColorfulBatch's tweak with {@link #setTweak(float)} to make
077     * all of the tweak adjustments virtually imperceptible. When this is set as the tweak, it won't change the luma
078     * multiplier or luma contrast, and it won't change either chromatic value multiplier.
079     */
080    public static final float TWEAK_RESET = ColorTools.ycwcm(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
081    protected float tweak = TWEAK_RESET;
082
083    /** Number of render calls since the last {@link #begin()}. **/
084    public int renderCalls = 0;
085
086    /** Number of rendering calls, ever. Will not be reset unless set manually. **/
087    public int totalRenderCalls = 0;
088
089    /** The maximum number of sprites rendered in one batch so far. **/
090    public int maxSpritesInBatch = 0;
091
092    /** Constructs a new ColorfulBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, and the default shader.
093     * @see #ColorfulBatch(int, ShaderProgram) */
094    public ColorfulBatch() {
095        this(1000, null);
096    }
097
098    /** Constructs a ColorfulBatch with one buffer and the default shader.
099     * @see #ColorfulBatch(int, ShaderProgram)  */
100    public ColorfulBatch(int size) {
101        this(size, null);
102    }
103
104    /** Constructs a new ColorfulBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis
105     * point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with
106     * respect to the current screen resolution.
107     * <p>
108     * The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different than
109     * the ones expect for shaders set with {@link #setShader(ShaderProgram)}. See {@link #createDefaultShader()}.
110     * @param size The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 16383.
111     * @param defaultShader The default shader to use. This is not owned by the ColorfulBatch and must be disposed separately. */
112    public ColorfulBatch(int size, ShaderProgram defaultShader) {
113        // 65535 is max vertex index, so 65535 / 4 vertices per sprite = 16383 sprites max.
114        if (size > 16383) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can't have more than 16383 sprites per batch: " + size);
115
116        Mesh.VertexDataType vertexDataType = (Gdx.gl30 != null) ? Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexBufferObjectWithVAO : Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexArray;
117
118        mesh = new Mesh(vertexDataType, false, size * 4, size * 6,
119                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.Position, 2, ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE),
120                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE),
121                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.TextureCoordinates, 2, ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0"),
122                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE));
123
124        projectionMatrix.setToOrtho2D(0, 0, Gdx.graphics.getWidth(), Gdx.graphics.getHeight());
125
126        vertices = new float[size * SPRITE_SIZE];
127
128        int len = size * 6;
129        short[] indices = new short[len];
130        short j = 0;
131        for (int i = 0; i < len; i += 6, j += 4) {
132            indices[i] = j;
133            indices[i + 1] = (short)(j + 1);
134            indices[i + 2] = (short)(j + 2);
135            indices[i + 3] = (short)(j + 2);
136            indices[i + 4] = (short)(j + 3);
137            indices[i + 5] = j;
138        }
139        mesh.setIndices(indices);
140
141        if (defaultShader == null) {
142            shader = createDefaultShader();
143            ownsShader = true;
144        } else
145            shader = defaultShader;
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Makes a new instance of the default ShaderProgram used for this ColorfulBatch, without any {@code #version}
150     * specified in the shader source. This expects an extra attribute (relative to a normal SpriteBatch) that is used
151     * for the tweak. You may want to set the code to prepend before you call this, as with:
152     * {@code ShaderProgram.prependVertexCode = "#version 110\n";
153     * ShaderProgram.prependFragmentCode = "#version 110\n";}
154     * The actual version can be different, and may need to be different for compatibility with some hardware.
155     * @return a new instance of the default shader used by ColorfulBatch for GL2 when no shader is specified
156     */
157    public static ShaderProgram createDefaultShader () {
158        String vertexShader = "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
159                + "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
160                + "attribute vec2 " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
161                + "attribute vec4 " + TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
162                + "uniform mat4 u_projTrans;\n" //
163                + "varying vec4 v_color;\n" //
164                + "varying vec4 v_tweak;\n" //
165                + "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" //
166                + "varying float v_lightFix;\n" //
167                + "\n" //
168                + "void main()\n" //
169                + "{\n" //
170                + "   v_color = " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
171                + "   v_color.a = v_color.a * (255.0/254.0);\n" //
172                + "   v_tweak = " + TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
173                + "   v_tweak.a = pow(v_tweak.a * (255.0/254.0) + 0.5, 1.709);\n" //
174                + "   v_lightFix = 1.0 + pow(v_tweak.a, 1.41421356);\n" //
175                + "   v_texCoords = " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
176                + "   gl_Position =  u_projTrans * " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
177                + "}\n";
178        String fragmentShader =
179                "#ifdef GL_ES\n" +
180                        "#define LOWP lowp\n" +
181                        "precision mediump float;\n" +
182                        "#else\n" +
183                        "#define LOWP \n" +
184                        "#endif\n" +
185                        "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" +
186                        "varying LOWP vec4 v_color;\n" +
187                        "varying LOWP vec4 v_tweak;\n" +
188                        "varying float v_lightFix;\n" +
189                        "uniform sampler2D u_texture;\n" +
190                        "const vec3 bright = vec3(0.375, 0.5, 0.125);\n" +
191                        "void main()\n" +
192                        "{\n" +
193                        "   vec4 tgt = texture2D( u_texture, v_texCoords );\n" +
194                        "   vec3 ycc = vec3(\n" +
195                        "     (v_color.r - 0.5 + v_tweak.r * pow(dot(tgt.rgb, bright), v_tweak.a) * v_lightFix),\n" + // luma
196                        "     (v_color.g - 0.5 + (tgt.r - tgt.b) * v_tweak.g) * 2.0,\n" + // warmth
197                        "     (v_color.b - 0.5 + (tgt.g - tgt.b) * v_tweak.b) * 2.0);\n" + // mildness
198                        "   gl_FragColor = vec4( (clamp(mat3(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.625, -0.375, -0.375, -0.5, 0.5, -0.5) * ycc, 0.0, 1.0)), v_color.a * tgt.a);\n" +
199                        "}";
200
201
202        ShaderProgram shader = new ShaderProgram(vertexShader, fragmentShader);
203        if (!shader.isCompiled()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Error compiling shader: " + shader.getLog());
204        return shader;
205    }
206
207    @Override
208    public void begin () {
209        if (drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.end must be called before begin.");
210        renderCalls = 0;
211
212        Gdx.gl.glDepthMask(false);
213        if (customShader != null)
214            customShader.bind();
215        else
216            shader.bind();
217        setupMatrices();
218
219        drawing = true;
220    }
221
222    @Override
223    public void end () {
224        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before end.");
225        if (idx > 0) flush();
226        lastTexture = null;
227        drawing = false;
228
229        GL20 gl = Gdx.gl;
230        gl.glDepthMask(true);
231        if (isBlendingEnabled()) gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
232    }
233
234    @Override
235    public void setColor (Color tint) {
236        color = tint.toFloatBits();
237    }
238
239    /**
240     * Sets the additive changes to the YCwCm color, as well as the multiplicative change to the alpha.
241     * @param lumaAdd additive luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
242     * @param warmAdd additive chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
243     * @param mildAdd additive chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
244     * @param alphaMul multiplicative alpha channel, from 0 to 1; 1.0 is neutral
245     */
246    @Override
247    public void setColor (float lumaAdd, float warmAdd, float mildAdd, float alphaMul) {
248        color = ColorTools.ycwcm(lumaAdd, warmAdd, mildAdd, alphaMul);
249    }
250
251    public void setColor (final float color) {
252        setPackedColor(color);
253    }
254
255    /**
256     * Expects an int color in the format (lightness, 8 bits), (chroma warm, 8 bits), (chroma mild, 8 bits), (alpha,
257     * 7 bits), (ignored, 1 bit).
258     * @param color an int color with alpha in the least significant byte and lightness in the most significant
259     */
260    public void setIntColor(final int color) {
261        this.color = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat(Integer.reverseBytes(color & -2));
262    }
263
264    public void setIntColor(int luma, int warm, int mild, int alpha) {
265        color = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat((alpha << 24 & 0xFE000000)
266                | (mild << 16 & 0xFF0000) | (warm << 8 & 0xFF00) | (luma & 0xFF));
267    }
268
269    @Override
270    public void setPackedColor (final float color) {
271        this.color = color;
272    }
273
274    @Override
275    public Color getColor () {
276        final int intBits = NumberUtils.floatToRawIntBits(color);
277        Color color = tempColor;
278        color.r = (intBits & 0xff) / 255f;
279        color.g = ((intBits >>> 8) & 0xff) / 255f;
280        color.b = ((intBits >>> 16) & 0xff) / 255f;
281        color.a = (intBits >>> 25) / 127f;
282        return color;
283    }
284
285    @Override
286    public float getPackedColor () {
287        return color;
288    }
289
290    /**
291     * Sets the multiplicative changes to the YCwCm color, along with the contrast.
292     * @param lumaMul multiplicative luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
293     * @param warmMul multiplicative chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
294     * @param mildMul multiplicative chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
295     * @param contrast affects how lightness changes, from 0 (low contrast, cloudy look) to 1 (high contrast, sharpened look); 0.5 is neutral
296     */
297    public void setTweak (float lumaMul, float warmMul, float mildMul, float contrast) {
298        tweak = ColorTools.ycwcm(lumaMul, warmMul, mildMul, contrast);
299    }
300
301    /**
302     * Sets the tweak using a single packed YCwCm float.
303     * @see #setTweak(float, float, float, float)
304     * @param tweak a packed YCwCm float, with contrast instead of alpha
305     */
306    public void setTweak (final float tweak) {
307        this.tweak = tweak;
308    }
309    
310    public float getTweak () {
311        return tweak;
312    }
313    
314    public void setIntTweak(final int tweak) {
315        this.tweak = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat(Integer.reverseBytes(tweak & -2));
316    }
317
318    public void setIntTweak(int luma, int warm, int mild, int contrast) {
319        tweak = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat((contrast << 24 & 0xFE000000)
320                | (mild << 16 & 0xFF0000) | (warm << 8 & 0xFF00) | (luma & 0xFF));
321    }
322    /**
323     * A convenience method that sets both the color (with {@link #setColor(float)}) and the tweak (with
324     * {@link #setTweak(float)}) at the same time.
325     * @param color the additive components and alpha, as a packed float
326     * @param tweak the multiplicative components and contrast, as a packed float
327     */
328    public void setTweakedColor(final float color, final float tweak) {
329        setColor(color);
330        setTweak(tweak);
331    }
332    /**
333     * A convenience method that sets both the color (with {@link #setColor(float, float, float, float)}) and the tweak
334     * (with {@link #setTweak(float, float, float, float)}) at the same time.
335     * @param lumaAdd additive luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
336     * @param warmAdd additive chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
337     * @param mildAdd additive chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
338     * @param alphaMul multiplicative alpha channel, from 0 to 1; 1.0 is neutral
339     * @param lumaMul multiplicative luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
340     * @param warmMul multiplicative chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
341     * @param mildMul multiplicative chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
342     * @param contrast affects how lightness changes, from 0 (low contrast, cloudy look) to 1 (high contrast, sharpened look); 0.5 is neutral
343     */
344    public void setTweakedColor (final float lumaAdd, final float warmAdd,
345                                 final float mildAdd, final float alphaMul,
346                                 final float lumaMul, final float warmMul,
347                                 final float mildMul, final float contrast) {
348        setColor(lumaAdd, warmAdd, mildAdd, alphaMul);
349        setTweak(lumaMul, warmMul, mildMul, contrast);
350    }
351
352    @Override
353    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height, float scaleX,
354                      float scaleY, float rotation, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
355        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
356
357        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
358
359        if (texture != lastTexture)
360            switchTexture(texture);
361        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
362            flush();
363
364        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
365        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
366        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
367        float fx = -originX;
368        float fy = -originY;
369        float fx2 = width - originX;
370        float fy2 = height - originY;
371
372        // scale
373        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
374            fx *= scaleX;
375            fy *= scaleY;
376            fx2 *= scaleX;
377            fy2 *= scaleY;
378        }
379
380        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
381        final float p1x = fx;
382        final float p1y = fy;
383        final float p2x = fx;
384        final float p2y = fy2;
385        final float p3x = fx2;
386        final float p3y = fy2;
387        final float p4x = fx2;
388        final float p4y = fy;
389
390        float x1;
391        float y1;
392        float x2;
393        float y2;
394        float x3;
395        float y3;
396        float x4;
397        float y4;
398
399        // rotate
400        if (rotation != 0) {
401            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
402            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
403
404            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
405            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
406
407            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
408            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
409
410            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
411            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
412
413            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
414            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
415        } else {
416            x1 = p1x;
417            y1 = p1y;
418
419            x2 = p2x;
420            y2 = p2y;
421
422            x3 = p3x;
423            y3 = p3y;
424
425            x4 = p4x;
426            y4 = p4y;
427        }
428
429        x1 += worldOriginX;
430        y1 += worldOriginY;
431        x2 += worldOriginX;
432        y2 += worldOriginY;
433        x3 += worldOriginX;
434        y3 += worldOriginY;
435        x4 += worldOriginX;
436        y4 += worldOriginY;
437
438        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
439        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
440        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
441        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
442
443        if (flipX) {
444            float tmp = u;
445            u = u2;
446            u2 = tmp;
447        }
448
449        if (flipY) {
450            float tmp = v;
451            v = v2;
452            v2 = tmp;
453        }
454
455        final float color = this.color;
456        final float tweak = this.tweak;
457        final int idx = this.idx;
458        vertices[idx] = x1;
459        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
460        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
461        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
462        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
463        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
464
465        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
466        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
467        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
468        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
469        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
470        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
471
472        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
473        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
474        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
475        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
476        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
477        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
478
479        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
480        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
481        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
482        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
483        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
484        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
485        this.idx = idx + 24;
486    }
487
488    @Override
489    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth,
490                      int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
491        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
492
493        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
494
495        if (texture != lastTexture)
496            switchTexture(texture);
497        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
498            flush();
499
500        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
501        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
502        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
503        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
504        final float fx2 = x + width;
505        final float fy2 = y + height;
506
507        if (flipX) {
508            float tmp = u;
509            u = u2;
510            u2 = tmp;
511        }
512
513        if (flipY) {
514            float tmp = v;
515            v = v2;
516            v2 = tmp;
517        }
518
519        final float color = this.color;
520        final float tweak = this.tweak;
521        final int idx = this.idx;
522        vertices[idx] = x;
523        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
524        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
525        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
526        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
527        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
528
529        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
530        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
531        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
532        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
533        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
534        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
535
536        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
537        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
538        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
539        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
540        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
541        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
542
543        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
544        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
545        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
546        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
547        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
548        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
549        this.idx = idx + 24;
550    }
551
552    @Override
553    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight) {
554        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
555
556        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
557
558        if (texture != lastTexture)
559            switchTexture(texture);
560        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
561            flush();
562
563        final float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
564        final float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
565        final float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
566        final float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
567        final float fx2 = x + srcWidth;
568        final float fy2 = y + srcHeight;
569
570        final float color = this.color;
571        final float tweak = this.tweak;
572        final int idx = this.idx;
573        vertices[idx] = x;
574        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
575        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
576        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
577        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
578        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
579
580        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
581        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
582        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
583        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
584        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
585        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
586
587        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
588        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
589        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
590        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
591        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
592        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
593
594        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
595        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
596        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
597        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
598        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
599        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
600        this.idx = idx + 24;
601    }
602
603    @Override
604    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, float u, float v, float u2, float v2) {
605        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
606
607        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
608
609        if (texture != lastTexture)
610            switchTexture(texture);
611        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
612            flush();
613
614        final float fx2 = x + width;
615        final float fy2 = y + height;
616
617        final float color = this.color;
618        final float tweak = this.tweak;
619        final int idx = this.idx;
620        vertices[idx] = x;
621        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
622        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
623        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
624        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
625        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
626
627        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
628        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
629        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
630        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
631        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
632        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
633
634        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
635        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
636        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
637        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
638        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
639        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
640
641        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
642        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
643        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
644        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
645        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
646        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
647        this.idx = idx + 24;
648    }

650    @Override
651    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y) {
652        draw(texture, x, y, texture.getWidth(), texture.getHeight());
653    }
654
655    @Override
656    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
657        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
658
659        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
660
661        if (texture != lastTexture)
662            switchTexture(texture);
663        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
664            flush();
665
666        final float fx2 = x + width;
667        final float fy2 = y + height;
668        final float u = 0;
669        final float v = 1;
670        final float u2 = 1;
671        final float v2 = 0;
672
673        final float color = this.color;
674        final float tweak = this.tweak;
675        final int idx = this.idx;
676        vertices[idx] = x;
677        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
678        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
679        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
680        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
681        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
682
683        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
684        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
685        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
686        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
687        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
688        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
689
690        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
691        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
692        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
693        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
694        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
695        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
696
697        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
698        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
699        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
700        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
701        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
702        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
703        this.idx = idx + 24;
704    }
705
706    /**
707     * This is very different from the other overloads in this class; it assumes the float array it is given is in the
708     * format libGDX uses to give to SpriteBatch, that is, in groups of 20 floats per sprite. ColorfulBatch uses 24
709     * floats per sprite, to add tweak per color, so this does some conversion.
710     * @param texture the Texture being drawn from; usually an atlas or some parent Texture with lots of TextureRegions
711     * @param spriteVertices not the same format as {@link #vertices} in this class; should have a length that's a multiple of 20
712     * @param offset where to start drawing vertices from {@code spriteVertices}
713     * @param count how many vertices to draw from {@code spriteVertices} (20 vertices is one sprite)
714     */
715    @Override
716    public void draw (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
717        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
718
719        count = (count / 5) * 6;
720        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
721        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
722        if (texture != lastTexture)
723            switchTexture(texture);
724        else {
725            remainingVertices -= idx;
726            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
727                flush();
728                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
729            }
730        }
731        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
732        final float tweak = this.tweak;
733
734        ////old way, breaks when libGDX code expects SPRITE_SIZE to be 20
735        //System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
736        ////new way, thanks mgsx
737        for (int s = offset, v = idx, i = 0; i < copyCount; i += 6) {
738            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
739            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
740            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
741            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
742            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
743            vertices[v++] = tweak;
744        }
745        idx += copyCount;
746        count -= copyCount;
747        while (count > 0) {
748            offset += (copyCount / 6) * 5;
749            flush();
750            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
751            ////old way, breaks when libGDX code expects SPRITE_SIZE to be 20
752            //System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
753            ////new way, thanks mgsx
754            for (int s = offset, v = 0, i = 0; i < copyCount; i += 6) {
755                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
756                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
757                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
758                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
759                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
760                vertices[v++] = tweak;
761            }
762            idx += copyCount;
763            count -= copyCount;
764        }
765    }
766
767    /**
768     * Meant for code that uses ColorfulBatch specifically and can set an extra float (for the color tweak) per vertex,
769     * this is just like {@link #draw(Texture, float[], int, int)} when used in other Batch implementations, but expects
770     * {@code spriteVertices} to have a length that is a multiple of 24 instead of 20.
771     * @param texture the Texture being drawn from; usually an atlas or some parent Texture with lots of TextureRegions
772     * @param spriteVertices vertices formatted as this class uses them; length should be a multiple of 24
773     * @param offset where to start drawing vertices from {@code spriteVertices}
774     * @param count how many vertices to draw from {@code spriteVertices} (24 vertices is one sprite)
775     */
776    public void drawExactly (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
777        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
778
779        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
780        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
781        if (texture != lastTexture)
782            switchTexture(texture);
783        else {
784            remainingVertices -= idx;
785            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
786                flush();
787                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
788            }
789        }
790        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
791
792        System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
793        idx += copyCount;
794        count -= copyCount;
795        while (count > 0) {
796            offset += copyCount;
797            flush();
798            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
799            System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
800            idx += copyCount;
801            count -= copyCount;
802        }
803    }
804
805    @Override
806    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y) {
807        draw(region, x, y, region.getRegionWidth(), region.getRegionHeight());
808    }
809
810    @Override
811    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
812        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
813
814        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
815
816        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
817        if (texture != lastTexture) {
818            switchTexture(texture);
819        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
820            flush();
821        }
822        final float fx2 = x + width;
823        final float fy2 = y + height;
824        final float u = region.getU();
825        final float v = region.getV2();
826        final float u2 = region.getU2();
827        final float v2 = region.getV();
828
829        final float color = this.color;
830        final float tweak = this.tweak;
831        final int idx = this.idx;
832        vertices[idx] = x;
833        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
834        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
835        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
836        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
837        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
838
839        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
840        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
841        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
842        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
843        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
844        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
845
846        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
847        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
848        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
849        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
850        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
851        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
852
853        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
854        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
855        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
856        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
857        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
858        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
859        this.idx = idx + 24;
860    }
861
862    @Override
863    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
864                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation) {
865        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
866
867        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
868
869        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
870        if (texture != lastTexture) {
871            switchTexture(texture);
872        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
873            flush();
874
875        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
876        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
877        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
878        float fx = -originX;
879        float fy = -originY;
880        float fx2 = width - originX;
881        float fy2 = height - originY;
882
883        // scale
884        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
885            fx *= scaleX;
886            fy *= scaleY;
887            fx2 *= scaleX;
888            fy2 *= scaleY;
889        }
890
891        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
892        final float p1x = fx;
893        final float p1y = fy;
894        final float p2x = fx;
895        final float p2y = fy2;
896        final float p3x = fx2;
897        final float p3y = fy2;
898        final float p4x = fx2;
899        final float p4y = fy;
900
901        float x1;
902        float y1;
903        float x2;
904        float y2;
905        float x3;
906        float y3;
907        float x4;
908        float y4;
909
910        // rotate
911        if (rotation != 0) {
912            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
913            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
914
915            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
916            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
917
918            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
919            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
920
921            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
922            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
923
924            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
925            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
926        } else {
927            x1 = p1x;
928            y1 = p1y;
929
930            x2 = p2x;
931            y2 = p2y;
932
933            x3 = p3x;
934            y3 = p3y;
935
936            x4 = p4x;
937            y4 = p4y;
938        }
939
940        x1 += worldOriginX;
941        y1 += worldOriginY;
942        x2 += worldOriginX;
943        y2 += worldOriginY;
944        x3 += worldOriginX;
945        y3 += worldOriginY;
946        x4 += worldOriginX;
947        y4 += worldOriginY;
948
949        final float u = region.getU();
950        final float v = region.getV2();
951        final float u2 = region.getU2();
952        final float v2 = region.getV();
953
954        final float color = this.color;
955        final float tweak = this.tweak;
956        final int idx = this.idx;
957        vertices[idx] = x1;
958        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
959        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
960        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
961        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
962        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
963
964        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
965        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
966        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
967        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
968        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
969        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
970
971        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
972        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
973        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
974        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
975        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
976        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
977
978        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
979        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
980        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
981        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
982        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
983        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
984        this.idx = idx + 24;
985    }
986
987    @Override
988    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
989                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation, boolean clockwise) {
990        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
991
992        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
993
994        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
995        if (texture != lastTexture) {
996            switchTexture(texture);
997        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
998            flush();
999
1000        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
1001        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
1002        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
1003        float fx = -originX;
1004        float fy = -originY;
1005        float fx2 = width - originX;
1006        float fy2 = height - originY;
1007
1008        // scale
1009        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
1010            fx *= scaleX;
1011            fy *= scaleY;
1012            fx2 *= scaleX;
1013            fy2 *= scaleY;
1014        }
1015
1016        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
1017        final float p1x = fx;
1018        final float p1y = fy;
1019        final float p2x = fx;
1020        final float p2y = fy2;
1021        final float p3x = fx2;
1022        final float p3y = fy2;
1023        final float p4x = fx2;
1024        final float p4y = fy;
1025
1026        float x1;
1027        float y1;
1028        float x2;
1029        float y2;
1030        float x3;
1031        float y3;
1032        float x4;
1033        float y4;
1034
1035        // rotate
1036        if (rotation != 0) {
1037            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
1038            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
1039
1040            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
1041            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
1042
1043            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
1044            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
1045
1046            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
1047            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
1048
1049            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
1050            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
1051        } else {
1052            x1 = p1x;
1053            y1 = p1y;
1054
1055            x2 = p2x;
1056            y2 = p2y;
1057
1058            x3 = p3x;
1059            y3 = p3y;
1060
1061            x4 = p4x;
1062            y4 = p4y;
1063        }
1064
1065        x1 += worldOriginX;
1066        y1 += worldOriginY;
1067        x2 += worldOriginX;
1068        y2 += worldOriginY;
1069        x3 += worldOriginX;
1070        y3 += worldOriginY;
1071        x4 += worldOriginX;
1072        y4 += worldOriginY;
1073
1074        float u1, v1, u2, v2, u3, v3, u4, v4;
1075        if (clockwise) {
1076            u1 = region.getU2();
1077            v1 = region.getV2();
1078            u2 = region.getU();
1079            v2 = region.getV2();
1080            u3 = region.getU();
1081            v3 = region.getV();
1082            u4 = region.getU2();
1083            v4 = region.getV();
1084        } else {
1085            u1 = region.getU();
1086            v1 = region.getV();
1087            u2 = region.getU2();
1088            v2 = region.getV();
1089            u3 = region.getU2();
1090            v3 = region.getV2();
1091            u4 = region.getU();
1092            v4 = region.getV2();
1093        }
1094
1095        final float color = this.color;
1096        final float tweak = this.tweak;
1097        final int idx = this.idx;
1098        vertices[idx] = x1;
1099        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
1100        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
1101        vertices[idx + 3] = u1;
1102        vertices[idx + 4] = v1;
1103        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
1104
1105        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
1106        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
1107        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
1108        vertices[idx + 9] = u2;
1109        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
1110        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
1111
1112        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
1113        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
1114        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
1115        vertices[idx + 15] = u3;
1116        vertices[idx + 16] = v3;
1117        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
1118
1119        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
1120        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
1121        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
1122        vertices[idx + 21] = u4;
1123        vertices[idx + 22] = v4;
1124        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
1125        this.idx = idx + 24;
1126    }
1127
1128    @Override
1129    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float width, float height, Affine2 transform) {
1130        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
1131
1132        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
1133
1134        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
1135        if (texture != lastTexture) {
1136            switchTexture(texture);
1137        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
1138            flush();
1139        }
1140
1141        // construct corner points
1142        float x1 = transform.m02;
1143        float y1 = transform.m12;
1144        float x2 = transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
1145        float y2 = transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
1146        float x3 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
1147        float y3 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
1148        float x4 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m02;
1149        float y4 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m12;
1150
1151        float u = region.getU();
1152        float v = region.getV2();
1153        float u2 = region.getV2();
1154        float v2 = region.getV();
1155
1156        final float color = this.color;
1157        final float tweak = this.tweak;
1158        final int idx = this.idx;
1159        vertices[idx] = x1;
1160        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
1161        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
1162        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
1163        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
1164        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
1165
1166        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
1167        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
1168        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
1169        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
1170        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
1171        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
1172
1173        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
1174        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
1175        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
1176        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
1177        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
1178        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
1179
1180        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
1181        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
1182        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
1183        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
1184        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
1185        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
1186        this.idx = idx + 24;
1187    }
1188
1189    @SuppressWarnings("RedundantCast") // These casts are absolutely not redundant! Java 9 changed Buffer ABI.
1190    @Override
1191    public void flush () {
1192        if (idx == 0) return;
1193
1194        renderCalls++;
1195        totalRenderCalls++;
1196        int spritesInBatch = idx / SPRITE_SIZE;
1197        if (spritesInBatch > maxSpritesInBatch) maxSpritesInBatch = spritesInBatch;
1198        int count = spritesInBatch * 6;
1199
1200        lastTexture.bind();
1201        Mesh mesh = this.mesh;
1202        mesh.setVertices(vertices, 0, idx);
1203        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).position(0);
1204        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).limit(count);
1205
1206        if (blendingDisabled) {
1207            Gdx.gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1208        } else {
1209            Gdx.gl.glEnable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1210            if (blendSrcFunc != -1) Gdx.gl.glBlendFuncSeparate(blendSrcFunc, blendDstFunc, blendSrcFuncAlpha, blendDstFuncAlpha);
1211        }
1212
1213        mesh.render(customShader != null ? customShader : shader, GL20.GL_TRIANGLES, 0, count);
1214
1215        idx = 0;
1216    }
1217
1218    @Override
1219    public void disableBlending () {
1220        if (blendingDisabled) return;
1221        flush();
1222        blendingDisabled = true;
1223    }
1224
1225    @Override
1226    public void enableBlending () {
1227        if (!blendingDisabled) return;
1228        flush();
1229        blendingDisabled = false;
1230    }
1231
1232    @Override
1233    public void setBlendFunction (int srcFunc, int dstFunc) {
1234        setBlendFunctionSeparate(srcFunc, dstFunc, srcFunc, dstFunc);
1235    }
1236
1237    @Override
1238    public void setBlendFunctionSeparate(int srcFuncColor, int dstFuncColor, int srcFuncAlpha, int dstFuncAlpha) {
1239        if (blendSrcFunc == srcFuncColor && blendDstFunc == dstFuncColor && blendSrcFuncAlpha == srcFuncAlpha && blendDstFuncAlpha == dstFuncAlpha) return;
1240        flush();
1241        blendSrcFunc = srcFuncColor;
1242        blendDstFunc = dstFuncColor;
1243        blendSrcFuncAlpha = srcFuncAlpha;
1244        blendDstFuncAlpha = dstFuncAlpha;
1245    }
1246
1247    @Override
1248    public int getBlendSrcFunc () {
1249        return blendSrcFunc;
1250    }
1251
1252    @Override
1253    public int getBlendDstFunc () {
1254        return blendDstFunc;
1255    }
1256
1257    @Override
1258    public int getBlendSrcFuncAlpha() {
1259        return blendSrcFuncAlpha;
1260    }
1261
1262    @Override
1263    public int getBlendDstFuncAlpha() {
1264        return blendDstFuncAlpha;
1265    }
1266
1267    @Override
1268    public void dispose () {
1269        mesh.dispose();
1270        if (ownsShader && shader != null) shader.dispose();
1271    }
1272
1273    @Override
1274    public Matrix4 getProjectionMatrix () {
1275        return projectionMatrix;
1276    }
1277
1278    @Override
1279    public Matrix4 getTransformMatrix () {
1280        return transformMatrix;
1281    }
1282
1283    @Override
1284    public void setProjectionMatrix (Matrix4 projection) {
1285        if (drawing) flush();
1286        projectionMatrix.set(projection);
1287        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1288    }
1289
1290    @Override
1291    public void setTransformMatrix (Matrix4 transform) {
1292        if (drawing) flush();
1293        transformMatrix.set(transform);
1294        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1295    }
1296
1297    protected void setupMatrices () {
1298        combinedMatrix.set(projectionMatrix).mul(transformMatrix);
1299        if (customShader != null) {
1300            customShader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1301            customShader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1302        } else {
1303            shader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1304            shader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1305        }
1306    }
1307
1308    protected void switchTexture (Texture texture) {
1309        flush();
1310        lastTexture = texture;
1311        invTexWidth = 1.0f / texture.getWidth();
1312        invTexHeight = 1.0f / texture.getHeight();
1313    }
1314
1315    @Override
1316    public void setShader (ShaderProgram shader) {
1317        if (drawing) {
1318            flush();
1319        }
1320        customShader = shader;
1321        if (drawing) {
1322            if (customShader != null)
1323                customShader.bind();
1324            else
1325                this.shader.bind();
1326            setupMatrices();
1327        }
1328    }
1329
1330    @Override
1331    public ShaderProgram getShader () {
1332        if (customShader == null) {
1333            return shader;
1334        }
1335        return customShader;
1336    }
1337
1338    @Override
1339    public boolean isBlendingEnabled () {
1340        return !blendingDisabled;
1341    }
1342
1343    public boolean isDrawing () {
1344        return drawing;
1345    }
1346    public static final int X1 = 0;
1347    public static final int Y1 = 1;
1348    public static final int C1 = 2;
1349    public static final int U1 = 3;
1350    public static final int V1 = 4;
1351    public static final int T1 = 5;
1352    public static final int X2 = 6;
1353    public static final int Y2 = 7;
1354    public static final int C2 = 8;
1355    public static final int U2 = 9;
1356    public static final int V2 = 10;
1357    public static final int T2 = 11;
1358    public static final int X3 = 12;
1359    public static final int Y3 = 13;
1360    public static final int C3 = 14;
1361    public static final int U3 = 15;
1362    public static final int V3 = 16;
1363    public static final int T3 = 17;
1364    public static final int X4 = 18;
1365    public static final int Y4 = 19;
1366    public static final int C4 = 20;
1367    public static final int U4 = 21;
1368    public static final int V4 = 22;
1369    public static final int T4 = 23;
1370}
